## Loading the data

```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

## Loading packages 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
my_candidates <- candidates %>%
  inner_join(contributions, by = "cand_id")
View(my_candidates)
```
